snippet: The Paley Center for Media will honor the composer and author Mary Rodgers, who died in June; Ms. Rodgers wrote musicals including “Once Upon a Mattress.”
abstract: The Paley Center for Media will honor the composer and author Mary Rodgers, who died in June; Ms. Rodgers wrote musicals including “Once Upon a Mattress.”

headline.main: Media Center Plans Mary Rodgers Tribute
headline.print_headline: Paley Media Center Plans  A Mary Rodgers Tribute
